normal.1: Performs up to 3 attacks using wind blades, dealing <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo>.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina, gathers a build up of high wind pressure, and deals <anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</anemo> after a short casting time.

plunging.1: Calling upon the power of Anemo, The Wanderer plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in his path. Deals <anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</anemo> upon impact with the ground.

description.0: Concentrates the power of the winds to break free from the shackles of the earth, dealing <anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</anemo> before leaping into the air and entering the Windfavored state.
description.3: The Wanderer enters a persistent hovering state, with increased Normal and Charged Attack AoE and DMG. Charged Attacks no longer consume stamina. While this state is active, The Wanderer's movements gain the following properties:
description.4: ·Persistently consumes Sky-Dweller Points to maintain this hovering state;
description.5: ·When sprinting, additional Sky-Dweller Points will be consumed for The Wanderer to sprint mid-air; holding down sprint will cause persistent Sky-Dweller point consumption to maintain speed;
description.6: ·Jumping expends extra Sky-Dweller Points to increase hovering height; holding jump will cause persistent Sky-Dweller point consumption to increase hovering height.
description.8: Running out of Sky-Dweller points will end the Windfavored state.
description.9: A second cast during the duration of Windfavored will also end it.
description.11: "The world dances in a weightless whirl, presenting a secret that can only be found in the flowers."

description.0: Compresses the atmosphere into a singular vacuum that grinds all troubles away, dealing multiple instances of <anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</anemo>.
description.1: If character is in the Windfavored state due to the skill Hanega: Song of the Wind, Windfavored state will end after casting.
description.3: "Bright be the narrowed gaze of the sky, casting its gaze on dreams both past and present, like radiance washing over dust on the winds."

description.0: If Hanega: Song of the Wind comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, this instance of the Windfavored state will obtain buffs according to the contacted element:
description.4: ·<electro>Electro</electro>: When Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents, 0.8 Energy will be restored. Energy can be restored in this manner every 0.2s.
description.6: You can have 2 different kinds of these buffs simultaneously.

description.0: When The Wanderer hits opponents with Normal and Charged Attacks in his Windfavored state, he has a 16% chance to obtain the Descent effect: The next time The Wanderer sprints while in this instance of the Windfavored state, this effect will be removed, this sprint instance will not consume any Sky-Dweller Points, and he will fire off 4 wind arrows that deal 35% of his ATK as Anemo DMG each.
description.1: For each Normal and Charged Attack that does not produce this effect, the next attack of those kinds will have a 12% increase chance of producing it. The calculation of the effect production is done once every 0.1s.

description.0: Mora expended when ascending Bows and Catalysts is decreased by 50%.
When in the Windfavored State, The Wanderer's Normal and Charged Attack SPD is increased by 10%.
description.1: Additionally, the wind arrows fired by the Passive Talent "Gales of Reverie" will deal an additional 25% of his ATK as DMG. You must unlock the Passive Talent "Gales of Reverie" first.

description.0: When in the Windfavored State, the Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays skill will see its DMG increased by 4% per point of difference between the max amount of Sky-Dweller Points contrasted with Sky-Dweller's present capacity when using this skill.
description.1: Through this method, you can increase Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays's DMG by a maximum of 200%.

description.0: Increases the Level of Hanega: Song of the Wind by 3.

When casting Hanega: Song of the Wind, should the Passive Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower" be triggered, the character will gain enhancement effects in correspondence to the contacted Elemental Type(s), and also gain a random untriggered enhancement effect.
description.1: You need to unlock the Passive Talent "Jade-Claimed Flower."

description.0: Increases the Level of Kyougen: Five Ceremonial Plays by 3.
When The Wanderer actively hits opponents with Normal Attacks while in the Windfavored state, the following effects will occur:
description.1: ·Deals an instance of 40% ATK as <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo>. This DMG will be considered Normal Attack DMG.
description.2: ·Restores 4 Sky-Dweller Points to The Wanderer. Sky-Dweller Points can be restored in this manner once every 0.2s. This restoration can occur 5 times within one Windfavored duration.
